title: Dragon Ball Discross Jinryoku God Max!!
original_name: ドラゴンボールディスクロス神カゴツド MAX ！！
sinopse: The manga features characters from the arcade game, such as Discross announcer Jin and the Discung Fu master known as Capsule Hermit. The story's protagonist is an average elementary school student Kuto Kurosu.
